Tricky Backfield
In the backfield Coaches Mallonee
and McNally have a number of fast,
tricky men. The starting quartet
will probably have Maxey, a fast 150- •
pound newcomer at quarterback;
Mehling and Kirstetter at the halves
and Sharetts at fullback. Mehling,
who has been converted from center,
weighs 170 and Is a fine blocking
back. Kirstetter, starting his second
year, will carry a good deal of the
Hopkins attack individually, since he
will do most of the passing and is
also a high-stepping, shifty runner.
To round out the backfield, Mallonee
has a man who may "make" the Blue
Jays. He is Sharetts, 200-pound
crushing fullbck from McDonogh.
In Wednesday's scrimmage Sharetts
repeatedly broke thru the "B" team
line and with fancy stepping eluded

Tricky Backfield
In the backfield Coaches Mallonee
and McNally have a number of fast,
tricky men. The starting quartet
will probably have Maxey, a fast 150- •
pound newcomer at quarterback;
Mehling and Kirstetter at the halves
and Sharetts at fullback. Mehling,
who has been converted from center,
weighs 170 and Is a fine blocking
back. Kirstetter, starting his second
year, will carry a good deal of the
Hopkins attack individually, since he
will do most of the passing and is
also a high-stepping, shifty runner.
To round out the backfield, Mallonee
has a man who may "make" the Blue
Jays. He is Sharetts, 200-pound
crushing fullbck from McDonogh.
In Wednesday's scrimmage Sharetts
repeatedly broke thru the "B" team
line and with fancy stepping eluded
